title: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided – Digital Deluxe Edition – v1.19 build 801.0 + All DLCs + Bonus Content (Re-repack)
body:
Deus Ex: Mankind Divided – Digital Deluxe Edition – v1.19 build 801.0 + All DLCs + Bonus Content (Re-repack)


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, RPG, Stealth, First-person, Third-person, 3D, Cyberpunk
Companies: Eidos-Montreal / Square Enix
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI8
Original Size: 49 GB
Repack Size: from 20.5 GB [Selective Download]

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT – [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet] ENG/RUS VO Only
  • Tapochek.net ENG/RUS VO Only
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: 7 hosters (Uploaded by LaRoyal, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: Google Drive (Uploaded by hermietkreeft)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Deus.Ex.Mankind.Divided.Digital.Deluxe.Edition.PROPER-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-deus.ex.mankind.divided.digital.deluxe.edition.iso (52,258,635,776 bytes)
  • Bonus Content (mini-OST, artbook, novel, comic book, 317 MB) added
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (when installed with all languages and optionals)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of unnecessary voicepacks, bonus content (mini-OST, artbook, novel, comic book) and optional movies (see section below)
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 49 to 20.5~29.6 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes from 15 minutes (8-threads CPU + SSD + 32 GB RAM, one language) up to one hour (4-threads CPU + HDD + 8 GB RAM, all languages and optionals)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 69 GB
  • Game language can be changed in game settings
  • Be advised, that if you want to enable non-English voiceovers language in game settings, you must choose that needed language by running “Language Selector.exe” in “retail” folder
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

The year is 2029, and mechanically augmented humans have now been deemed outcasts, living a life of complete and total segregation from the rest of society.

Now an experienced covert operative, Adam Jensen is forced to operate in a world that has grown to despise his kind. Armed with a new arsenal of state-of-the-art weapons and augmentations, he must choose the right approach, along with who to trust, in order to unravel a vast worldwide conspiracy.

Included Content

  • Deus Ex: Mankind Divided v1.19 build 801.0
  • Deus Ex: Mankind Divided – System Rift
  • Deus Ex: Mankind Divided – Assault Pack
  • Deus Ex: Mankind Divided – Tactical Pack
  • Deus Ex: Mankind Divided – Augmented Covert Agent Consumables Pack
  • Deus Ex: Mankind Divided – Classic Gear
  • Deus Ex: Mankind Divided – Enforcer Gear
  • Deus Ex: Mankind Divided – Intruder Gear
  • Deus Ex: Mankind Divided – Jensen Story: Desperate Measures
  • Deus Ex: Mankind Divided – A Criminal Past
  • Deus Ex: Mankind Divided – Digital Comic Book
  • Deus Ex: Mankind Divided – Digital Mini-Artbook
  • Deus Ex: Mankind Divided – Digital Novella
  • Deus Ex: Mankind Divided – Digital OST Sampler

Note: Since Breach Mode is linked to Internet leaderboards, it’s disabled by SKIDROW and not available.

Story recap:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D42AsgO28ZY + https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ws7MXsM2PRo

Announcement trailer
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ejRFQaIsvj0

The Mechanical Apartheid
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D7XCAgj0TtI

Breach Mode Intro
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fg0_zU_9YFg

You can skip downloading of voicepacks, optional and bonus files you don’t need. Here is the list of optional/selective files:

  • fg-optional-bonus-content.bin (bonus content, listed above)
  • fg-optional-videos.bin (Story recap video, Breach mode intro, placeholders and Breach-only movies, unavailable in cracked version – I gave YouTube links below for big ones – like Recap)
  • fg-selective-english.bin (Also must be installed by Polish users)
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-italian.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin (both Spanish and Spanish-Mexican languages must be downloaded and installed)
  • fg-selective-mexican.bin (both Spanish and Spanish-Mexican languages must be downloaded and installed)
  • fg-selective-russian.bin
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with German UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective/optional” files, but download fg-selective-german.bin & all main files (01-13).

This repack is EXTREMELY backwards compatible with my previous repack. The only changed files are fg-09.bin, fg-13.bin and setup.exe

Everything else can be rehashed to save you up to 29.6 GB of traffic.
